display_information_about_the_products_y: Display information about the products you have purchased at BAOOStore JSC Shop.
Must be at least 8 characters long.
it_should_contain_at_least_1_number_or_1: It should contain at least 1 number or 1 special character.
should_not_be_similar_to_recently_used_p: Should not be similar to recently used passwords.
some_errors_occured_try_again: Some errors occured. Please try again!
verify_email_tutorial: Please check your email and click on the verification link to complete the process.
send_request_after: You can request to send the email again after
please_select_an_image_smaller_than_5mb: Please select an image smaller than 5MB
for_safety,_x-mentor_shop_encourages_cus: For safety, BAOOStore JSC Shop encourages customers to use strong passwords.
